org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose

Class SweepLine.Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dyn4j.geometry.decompose.SweepLine.Vertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<SweepLine.Vertex>
    Enclosing class:
    SweepLine

    protected static class SweepLine.Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<SweepLine.Vertex>
    Represents a vertex on a polygon that stores information about the left and right edges and left and right vertices.
    Since:
    2.2.0
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    William Bittle

      • isInteriorRight

        public boolean isInteriorRight()
        Returns true if the interior is to the right of this vertex.

        The left edge of this vertex is used to determine where the interior of the polygon is.

        Returns:
        boolean
